entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug Assert errror #74362
  • Gracefully handle incomplete property setter in object initializer #74348
    Backlog
  • Rename session randomly dismisses itself #74347
  • Building and packing Roslyn twice on the command line fails #74345

Closed

  • Confusing error message about determinism and AssemblyVersion in VB #30738
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio hive preparation can take 15 minutes in roslyn-integration-CI #59851
    17.6 P2
  • Source generators, how to add project reference? #55003
  • Add internal API to fold FlowAnalysisAnnotations into the symbol's TypeWithAnnotations #47635
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57875
    17.6 P2
  • Test plan for "generic attributes" #36285
    17.0
  • Ensure warnings reported from Helix job are included in AzDO job #60512
  • CultureInfo.CurrentCulture API banned in Analyzers but alternative API is inaccessible #66566
    17.13
  • Test Plan for "Params Collections" feature #71137
    17.12
  • CSC : error CS0041: Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.' #73447
    17.11
  • Error/Warning messages on network share are not navigable #74105
  • Implicit Usings don't appear greyed out like other unused usings #72776
  • Collection Initializer cannot handle Extensions akin to `IEnumerable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` ( `IDE0028` vs `CS0029`) #72460
  • CS7038: Failed to emit module if new collection syntax is used with an implicit ImmutableArray operator. #74185
  • Remove IBuiltInAnalyzer.OpenFileOnly #74048
  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks (2) #74156
    17.11 P3
  • IImplementInterfaceService is implemented by calling a code action, but it should be the other way around #60990
    Backlog
  • Create LangVersion 13 #74194
    17.12
  • Analyzers created with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.4.0 cannot be used with .net 6 #65562
  • Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 from PREVIEW 1 cause errors in publish worker service #64184
  • Cache contains wrong information about COM interop after changes in the COM interfaces #73191
  • Source generator doesn't see DefaultMemberAttribute #73229
  • Source Generators referencing nuget packages cannot be debugged in VS #74027
  • [Source Generators] ISyntaxReceiver instances should be able to access AdditionalFiles #74167
  • CodeGen for defaulted collection expression elements (Span via InlineArray) #74184
  • Hitting Debug.Assert in the compiler (TypeWithAnnotations.cs) #74297
    17.12
  • Analyzer dependency loading is different in shadow copy scenarios. #66532
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Interceptors refkind differences #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add IsEnabled property to IEditorInlineRenameService #74361
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Convert HideAdvancedMembers option to editorconfig option #74360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify passing around of FAR symbol groups #74358
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix debug assert with operation blocks in invalid code #74354
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #74353
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle span conversions in expression trees #74349
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Revert "Extensions: Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field (#73407)" #74346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix UnscopedRef handling in indexers #74343
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Clarify error for AssemblyVersion with wildcard when deterministic VB #74351
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic category flag #74352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructors #74359
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Eliminate IdeAnalyzerOptions #74357
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add a ParamCollection test which uses the attribute included in .NET 9 SDK #74338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not include collection expression conversion to nullable value type in ClassifyStandardImplicitConversion() #74251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix layering of Implement-Interface code-fixer vs language service #74320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Note that toolset package layout is hard-coded in SDK #74301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle missing System.Nullable type #74330
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Remove fallbacks (3) #74323
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove 'open file only' concept from analyzer driver #74340
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK #74329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
